*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}: eslint --max-warnings=0 --rule 'no-console: error' --rule 'no-debugger: error' --rule 'unused-imports/no-unused-imports: error' --rule 'unused-imports/no-unused-vars: error' --rule 'jsx-a11y/click-events-have-key-events: error' --rule 'jsx-a11y/no-static-element-interactions: error' --rule 'jsx-a11y/no-noninteractive-element-interactions: error' --rule 'jsx-a11y/interactive-supports-focus: error' --rule 'jsx-a11y/no-noninteractive-tabindex: error' --rule 'react/jsx-no-target-blank: error' --rule '@next/next/no-img-element: error'
